title: Cant download league of legends
body: I recently uninstalled league of legends.But now I tried to download it again but it wouldnt work.I dont know why please help.

replies.body: I'd like to help but need more information!  What do you mean by it didn't work?  Are you getting any error messages?  Let me know!
I just cant download it.Whenever I try it says error 1935.

It sounds like you might be missing a feature or product with your OS that's required to complete installation.  This can usually happen if you get a new PC or reformat, and the first step to take would be updating your Windows to the most current version.  You can also manually download a specific product (Visual C++) for the installation [here](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).  Hopefully, this gets you fixed up!
When I try to download it it says error 1935 again? Also thanks for helping

But dont worry I just found an way to download it with this link http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/Installer/SingleFileInstall/LeagueOfLegendsBaseNA.exe
But thanks for all the help porocles
